choices: Change the world with the remote
1.content: Tails was walking in the woods.When suddenly he tripped and fell.He looked back and saw a device looking device.He picked it up and it had a bunch of buttons and knobs.He didn't know what to make of it.Untill he read the top of it which said Reality remote.He then saw the controls to change reality with the remote and decided to..
1.title: The Reality Remote

choices: Tails uses the remote on Bean
Tails uses the remote on Bark
Tails uses the remote on both of them
Tails decides to use the remote on Nack, he has to be nearby right?
Tails backs out as he wants the guinea pig to be alone in case it doesn't work
12.content: Having a hard time believing the remote to be legitimately what it was stated to be Tails decided to test it on someone and see the results which luckily for him he could hear the voice of a familiar duck in the distance, taking the opportunity Tails hopped into a set of bushes before he could be spotted as Bean was walking along the path with his companion Bark the Polar Bear. "SnaggleTooth McStealGrab said we should find a shiny nearby so we better get out of here fast with it before he throws another hissy fit." The fox rolled his eyes as he discovered the emerald a week ago and put it in a secure safety box back at home. Regardless of the situation at hand Tails was tempted to test the remote on these two considering that since they were villains if the remote worked on them it would benefit the planet itself.
12.title: Change someone else

122.content: What will he do to Bark?
122.title: Tails uses the remote on Bark

124.title: Tails decides to use the remote on Nack, he has...

1242.content:
Before Tails could react Nack grab him by the neck making Tails not able to fight back.
"Just the person i wanted to find. Now you're going to guide us to that precious emerald"

Tails start to become desperate as his options were running down, until he remember the remote on his hand. He didnt know what will do to him but it was his best chance to break free.

"GUYS, i foun-"
Before Nack could finish, Tails shot the remote without seeing the option. A big white light cover both of them...

What changed?
1242.title: Behind Tails (OH NO)

choices: One of them turn into a suit
12423.content: Maybe one of them turn in a perfect suit for the other to wear, granting him the others appearance.
12423.title: Something else

124231.content: Who will be the turned?
124231.title: One of them turn into a suit

1242311.content:
Unexpectedly, Tails body began to deflate until a suit that looks like him with a zipper on his back lay on the ground.
"Where that little brat go? Wait a second..."
Nack pick up Tails inspecting him, it was a exact copy of the fox.
"Where this came from?"

Then Nack notices a strange remote on the ground. He picks it up activating an "info" button: "You're using the "bodysuit" option now, it lets you transform any living being into a shiny suit for you to wear and turning you into a perfect copy of the subject."
"Well well well, looks like one of the little genius inventions backfired. Now look at you the great Tails turned into a pathethic suit."
"Maybe i shold wear you, now that is your purpose doesnt it? He he"
1242311.title: Tails

124231122.content: Maybe Tails suit forces him to wear it, taking control.
124231122.title: Something Else

1242312.content: Just Nack or both turn into suits?
1242312.title: Nack or both

choices: No, i still have ideas for both
1242322.content: Maybe the changes only apply to one of them...
1242322.title: Something Else

12423222.title: No, i still have ideas for both

151.content: Who does he morph into?
151.title: Morph into someone else

1512.content: He decides to touch a button and the device started to glow. Seconds later his body glowed as he began to change. He felt his body changing and getting taller. He was in pain that soon morphed into pleasure as when the process was comeplete he was now a naked Blaze. Realized what just happen he runs to his lab and looks at himself in a mirror. The device seemed to have morphed him into an identical copy of Blaze. He was surprised
1512.title: Blaze

15121.content: He didn't know what do next now that he was Blaze.He brought out the device again and decided to..
15121.title: Continue

choices: Look for Blaze and morph her into Tails

1512131.title: Look for Blaze and morph her into Tails

choices: Turn Cream into Blaze as well

15121311231.title: Time stop

151213112311.content:
He makes the device morph Blaze into a male tails. He realized that he didnt have clothes on so he switched her clothes out with him.

Will the device have the ability to alter someone's mind?"she said
151213112311.title: Into a male Tails

1512131123111.content: It has that ability..does she use it?
1512131123111.title: Yes

15121311231111.content:
Tails is now Blaze so he is now she)
She manages to get into the house through an open window, get Tails out of the house and under a tree, she altered hismemories to be exactly like Tails and gave herself some of her memories but not much to not overpower her current ones. After that she goes into the house and stopped the time stop ability and continued playing with cream as if nothing happened.
15121311231111.title: Yes

choices: Blaze alters Cream a bit in the meantime
Blaze waits for Cream to return.

"Mind if we have a tea party?"asked Cream.

"Sure Cream,"answered Blaze.

"Great."said Cream going to get the tea set.

While she waited for her, she began to play with her body and enjoyed the feeling. She had to stop it though, when Cream came back with the tea set.

"Here it is"Cream said happy

Blaze smiled happy

She goes to her old lab and saw that tails was doing an invention.

"Oh....ok"she said. It better not be to find out what she did as tails.

info.brief_description: Tails finds a Reality Changing Remote.
info.description:
Tails finds a reality changing remote.
Rules

1)No Own characters they only derail the story.

2}No vore, weight gain, inflation, regression, growth, or shrinking. They aren't relevant to the story.

3)Try to provide more in the way of options than just 'Next' or 'Something else'. This story is supposed to have some vein of choice in it, after all.

4)No Eggman,this means do not add Eggman to the story you can mention him but don't add him.
